Did they change the T&C?This means what? If u accept adv orders during mission timing no count?
adv orders count only if taken (matched) and completed within mission timing.
They basically want u to chiong 1 stop jobs non stop during those hrs
not too bad  its 4 hour slots. next day jobs dont count though.
They didnt have this condition for newbie mission
yep the newbie missions are easier.
Always remember1) if overweight  you are always entitled to an upgrade.2)waiting time also can claim but you must inform support when you reach.
Have been closing one eye all this time.....:(
motor can upgrade to car rate when overweight?
8kg very easy to exceed  esp those multistop ones.
How to estimate? Bring weighing scale ah
Just buy the luggage weighing scale lo
